name: Ok... What's next
description:
(for a better experience please download a desktop version)

Team up with a friend on a call to hunt all the treasures in the world

Created by Leandro Dorta, Josue Ortiz, JJosué Jaramillo, José Luis Estrella and Ronal Ruiz Grijalva in 4 days for the Global Game Jam 2021
